answers.author: Israel Murguia
answers.text:
Robert,
Depending on size, cities will be affected by the Federal budget cuts that will affect a broad range of services that  residents currently receive such as  healthcare, job training, and housing. One specific example is Boston. To get a general sense of what the impacts would look like for this respective city, view the following: http://www.cityofboston.gov/news/default.aspx?id=4996
A report has been released that examines the proposed cuts impact in detail. Additionally, you can get a sense of what other city's impact will be by going to the following: http://www.usmayors.org/cdbg/. I hope this helps.
